description: Water bottle, check. Day-use permit, check. Dependable hiking boots, check. Designed to take you farther, the Panorama is comfortable and stable. The abrasion-resistant suede upper and Danner Dry waterproof protection keep your feet dry and happy when the trails get muddy. The cushioned EVA midsole requires minimal break-in time and is super comfortable underfoot to keep you going on the trail. A rugged, high-traction outsole keeps your footing secure on rocky or changing terrain.
name: Danner Panorama Mid 6" - Mens

specs.value: These uppers are made from rich, durable suede.
100% waterproof barrier allows moisture to escape without letting water in, keeping your feet dry and comfortable all day long
Three layers of varying density are combined for maximum cushioning and support. The entire footbed is made of open-cell polyurethane for better heat dissipation and air circulation
The Panorama outsole wraps around the boot providing increased protection around the base of the foot. The large, deep lugs provide stability and traction, particularly in rugged terrain
For increased durability, we've added a polyurethane-coated leather rand for protection against scuffs and abrasions on the heel and forefoot

Designed for versatility, the DPDX has a low profile for everyday wear. Whether on the trail or urban exploring, this last was built to offer enough room for comfort while maintaining a sleek profile. Ortholite footbed included
